nodes.text: The Red Nebula exiles were a group of individuals from the planet of the Red Nebula who were exiled by the priests of the Red Nebula to prevent them from destroying the Great Life Jewels. While the priests of the Red Nebula temple believed that the jewels protected their planet from destruction, and thus held them in high regard, the exiles thought the jewels were blasphemous abominations that prevented Cosmic Destiny from proceeding naturally.
